title: Pure Silk Vanilla Shea Butter Spa Therapy Shave Cream for Women, 7.25 oz, Pack of 6
features: Formulated with a luxurious vanilla scent
Moisturizing smooth glide formula protects and nourishes
Paraben-free, Phthalate-Free, Dye-Free, No Animal Testing
Rust-proof aluminum bottom prevents rust rings
description: Pure silk vanilla shea butter spa therapy shaving cream delights the senses with a luxurious vanilla scent, while moisture, rich shea butter and aloe soften skin. The infusion of rich moisturizers protects, nourishes and provides a smooth glide to leave your skin looking, and feeling, as smooth as pure silk. Pure silk shaving cream is available in cans with rust, proof aluminum bottoms, making it ideal for the shower. Each pack comes with six 7.25 ounce pure silk vanilla shea butter shaving cream cans. For an exceptional shave, pair with pure silk razors.
